routines.name: Warm-up Chromatics
routines.description: 5 minutes of 1-2-3-4 chromatic patterns up and down the neck

routines.name: Major Scale Positions
routines.description: Play two-octave major scale in 5 positions with a metronome

routines.name: Chord Changes
routines.description: Practice G-C-D clean switches for 3 minutes
